name: CustomMaterial.CustomMaterialTexture
desc: A texture object that you use to create custom materials.

items.name: init(TextureResource)
items.desc: Creates a custom texture from a texture resource.

items.name: init(MaterialParameters.Texture)
items.desc: Creates a custom texture by copying values from a material parameters texture.

items.name: var resource: TextureResource
items.desc: The texture resource you use to create a custom texture.
